channel.title: Chicago War Food Metal Matiss Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago War Food Metal Matiss Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whee
item.description: so everyday for the past couple days I have been meaning to update my site. but I keep getting interupted or cool stuff happens and I am like ahh.. “later.”soo.. on thursday my friends and I went to brujeria at the aragon. it was incredible. the concert was apparently a mexican death metal festival - so there were a lot of bands. we got there at like 7 and the brujeria didn;t start until 12.
